text: "Your Song" is a 1970 song by Elton John. It was taken from his self-titled album Elton John. It was has first top 20 single for John internationally and charted highest in Canada where it peaked at number 3. It was later covered other artists. ==Track listings== ==References== Category:1970 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Elton John songs Category:Three Dog Night songs Category:Rod Stewart songs Category:Billy Joel songs Category:Ellie Goulding songs Category:Lady Gaga songs Category:Cilla Black songs
title: Your Song
